species-tag.png.description: A scatter plot with species names for each animal in place of a small, uniform dot. The images are generated by the species-tag function
A scatter plot with species names for each animal in place of a small, uniform dot. The images are generated by the species-tag function

age-bc.png.description: A scatter plot with the age for each animal represented by the size of its corresponding blue dot. The blue dot images are generated by the age-dot function
age-bc.png.caption: Pounds v. Weeks, showing the age of each animal

age-v-weeks-species-dot.png.caption: Age v. Weeks Scatter Plot, labeled by species
